entry.title: Glazes
entry.summary: What's in the Box? Liquitex Glazing Medium A glaze is a paint medium that is translucent, which when applied, will allow underlying color to show through. Additionally, a glaze will act as a “filter” that changes the color and value appearance of the surface. In other words,…
entry.content:
What's in the Box?

Liquitex Glazing Medium

General Info on Glazing Mediums

A glaze is a paint medium that is translucent, which when applied, will allow underlying color to show through. Additionally, a glaze will act as a “filter” that changes the color and value appearance of the surface. In other words, glazes can change color saturation, hue, and tone.

Tutorial: Glazing

How to Glaze Miniatures

Videos

Glazing explained in 5 minutes

How to Glaze

https://youtu.be/A13JfFJxtIg

entry.title: Mini-Painting Box
entry.summary: This site is primarily for the owners of the posh handmade mini painting box gift set. The site contains links to resources relating to items in the box, or related mini painting topics.
entry.content:
This site is primarily for the owners of the posh handmade mini painting box gift set.
